name: Hunter's Trap
description:
You arrived home after picking up some wood from the forest; your father went missing and only a trail of blood was left at the scene. Armed, you followed the treacherous trail to the depts of the forest. There you found a dark cave you have never seen before…

This is Hunter's Trap. My entry for the HPS1 Halloween Jam 2020.

Is in an incomplete state at the moment. I really like this project and I want to keep working on it. I hope you'll enjoy it!

CONTROLS

W,A,S,D: Movement

Mouse Left Click: Shoot active gun

R: Reload

1,2,3: Change weapons

Space: Dash

Shift: Run
